name: Dark Forest Tumblr Theme
description: A dark forest type layout for the dashboard and most other parts of tumblr that aren't actually blogs. Includes a hi-res background image perfect for larger monitors. If you're having spacing issues on the sidebar, try choosing 'no' on the "Slim Sidebar?" option. It's also important that you select 'no' if you use XKit's option to slim the sidebar instead. Otherwise, it's highly suggested you keep the sidebar slimmed as the buttons are horribly large by default. If you can't stand the background image in text areas select the option to hide it. I'm now using a code which should work more consistently than the previous version. Let me know via feedback if there's a page where it doesn't work.
